price: Mashawarta* daga mutãnensa suka ce: "Lalle ne mu, haƙĩƙa, Munã ganin ka a cikin ɓata bayyananniya."
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: * Kissar Nũhu da mutãnensa tanã nũna yanda Annabawa mãsu kãwo gaskiya ke yin faɗa da miyãgun mutãne mãsu ƙin gaskiya, sunã ƙõƙarin rufe ta haka kuma ƙissõshin da ke tafe a bãyanta sunã nũna yadda ƙarya ke faɗa da gaskiya, ta hanyõyi dabam-dabam.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
